thread.section_title: SIP Scootershop Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von SIP Scootershop | www.sip-scootershop.com | 6 von 412
thread.title: ANDREW

author: ANDREW
title: ANDREW
text: Ordered an exhaust. I was given a price for postage however on sip finalising invoice postage was increased with no consultaion with me as per their terms so order was cancelled on the same day. Was told refund would take a few days. No refund recieved. Emailed to enquire and was assured that it was refunded. It wasnt. 3 weeks later emailed again. They had made a mistake and money was eventually refuded. Unacceptable process. So much so would never use sip again.
